entry.title: โI try to seize every opportunity as a gift to do good,โ Tatev Petrossian

media:group.media:title: โI try to seize every opportunity as a gift to do good,โ Tatev Petrossian
media:group.media:description:
Todayโs guest on Mindful Leaders is Tatev Petrossian, an inspiring designer, entrepreneur, and a visionary. Born to Armenian parents and raised in France, Tatevโs deep ancestral connection to the regions of Mush, Sasun, Van, and Yegheknadzor has shapedf her life journey. After working in financial and strategy management, Tatev founded Revolve Consulting, a company centred on design thinking and the circular economy. However, the war in Artsakh triggered a powerful transformation in her life. Confronting pain and loss, she found strength and channelled her emotions into a driving force for change. This shift led her to design with a deeper, purpose-driven focus. In 2022, Tatev and her sister Emma founded Atelier79, a French-Armenian fine jewellery studio that challenges traditional norms by infusing each unique piece with rich stories. This episode delves into Tatevโs passion for creativity and innovation. We discuss how she has used her entrepreneurial journey to create design spaces encouraging mindfulness, meaning, and compassion. Through her work, Tatev reminds us that despite lifeโs challenges, we always have the choice to pursue endeavours with purpose, vision, and consciousness.
About Tatev Petrossian Tatev Petrossian is the co-founder of Atelier79, a French-Armenian fine jewellery studio. Born in Yerevan, Petrossian grew up in Nice and moved to Paris to study at the Grande Ecole of INSEEC. She then started her career in private equity investment, working on the Caucasian portfolio of an alternative assets fund based in Paris. Tatev navigated through various positions to become a consultant and advisor to different businesses in London and Moscow. She completed her second Masterโs degree at the Russian Presidential Academy of National Economy and Public Administration in Moscow. In 2018, Petrossian returned to Armenia and founded Revolve Consulting, a firm committed to raising awareness of alternative business models, notably design thinking and the circular economy. In 2021, Petrossian took a leap of faith and started Atelier79 with her sister Emma โ a fine jewellery studio. This new entrepreneurial path combined her years of experience in strategy and design thinking with the world of fine jewellery design. Driven by her passion for fine jewellery and her purpose to set a new standard for what French-Armenian fusion can represent, she leads Atelier79 as the head designer of both the brandโs collections and the bespoke co-design studio service.
Program Overview Mindful Leaders dives into the stories of people who have achieved prominence, walked incredible journeys, and have defined culture.
Lara sits down with specialists, thinkers, and change catalysts to deconstruct insights, events, and lessons that have shaped their personal and professional lives and have enabled them to create meaning and connection.
00:00 โ 3:12 Childhood, from Armenia to France 3:13 โ 6:13 Ancestry and descendant of strong women 6:14 โ 12:33 Multiple talents, portfolio careers, and making conscious choices 12:34 โ 15:01 Finding purpose after the war and loss of Artsakh 15:02 โ 19:16 The birth and intention of Atelier79 19:17 โ 21:47 The stories behind each Atelier79 piece 21:48 โ 28:03 Design thinking and conscious capitalism 28:04 โ 35:19 Navigating collective emotions and hope for the future

entry.title: Visaโs vision for business and economic development in Armenia

media:group.media:title: Visaโs vision for business and economic development in Armenia
media:group.media:description:
Partner content
In this interview, Diana Kiguradze, Visa's Regional Manager for the Caucasus, provides a comprehensive overview of the company's strategy and achievements in driving the growth of digital finance in Georgia and Armenia. Drawing on her experience spearheading Visa's agenda in this dynamic region, Kiguradze shares insights into the unique opportunities and obstacles faced in expanding electronic payments infrastructure, fostering financial inclusion, and adapting global solutions to local market dynamics.

ิฒีกึีฑึีกีฃีธึีตีถ ีคีกีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีญีธึีฐึีคีซ ีถีกีญีกีฃีกีฐีซ ีบีกีทีฟีธีถีซึ ีฐึีกีชีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีฟีพีกีฎ ิฟีกึีฅีถ ิฑีถีคึีฅีกีฝีตีกีถีจ ีบีกีฟีดีธึีด ีง, ีฉีฅ ีซีถีนีธึ ีธึีธีทีฅึ ีฌึีฅีฌ ีบีกีทีฟีธีถีจึ ีีกีทีฟีธีถีกีฉีธีฒีธึีฉีตีธึีถีซึ ีฐีฅีฟีธ ีซึ ีกีผีกีปีซีถ ีฐีกึึีกีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด ีถีก ีกีถีฏีฅีฒีฎีกีถีธึีด ีง ีพีกึีนีกีบีฅีฟ ีีซีฏีธีฌ ีีกีทีซีถีตีกีถีซ ึ ีถึีก ีฉีซีดีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีซึ ีฐีกึีกีขีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถ, ีญีธีฝีธึีด ีคีกีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกีฏีกึีฃีซ ีขีกึีฅึีธีญีธึีดีถีฅึีซ ีทีธึึีป ีฎีกีฃีกีฎ ีฝีฏีฆีขีธึีถึีกีตีซีถ ีฟีกึีกีฑีกีตีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถ ึ ีขีกึีกีฐีกีตีฟีธึีดี ีซีถีนีธึ ีซีดีกีฝีฟ ีนีฏีกึ ีทีกึีธึีถีกีฏีฅีฌีธึ ีบีกีทีฟีธีถีกีพีกึีธึีดีจึ

ีีกีฒีกึีกีบีฅีฟีซ ีดีกีดีธึีฌีซ ึีกึีฟีธึีฒีกึ ีีกีตีฏ ิฟีธีฝีฟีกีถีตีกีถีจ ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีฅีฌ ีง, ีธึ ีพีกึีธึีคีถีฅึีซ ีฏีธีฒีดีซึ ยซีฐีฅึีฉีกีฏีกีถ ีกีถีฃีกีด ีกีผีกีป ีฅีถ ึีกีทีพีธึีด ีกีถีฟึีกีดีกีขีกีถีกีฏีกีถ ีบีกีฐีกีถีปีถีฅึ, ีธึีธีถึ ีฆีธึีฃีธึีคีพีธึีด ีฅีถ ีทีกีถีฟีกีชีซ ีคึีฝึีธึีธึีดีถีฅึีธีพยปึ
ยซิปีถีนีบีฅีฝ ีฃีซีฟีฅึ, ีพีฅึีปีซีถ ีกีดีฝีพีก ีจีถีฉีกึึีธึีด ีฐีกีถึีธึีฉีตีกีถีจ ีบีกึีขีฅึีกีขีกึ ีกีผีซีฉ ีฅีถึ ีธึีถีฅึีฅีฌ ีฐีกีตีฟีถีฅีฌีธึ, ีธึ ีดีซีกีฝีถีกีฏีกีถ ีฟีธีดีฝีกีตีซีถ ีฐีกีดีกีฏีกึีฃีซ ีถีฅึีคึีดีกีถีจ ีฆีธึีฃีกีฐีฅีผ ีงีกีฏีกีถีธึีฅีถ ีฏึีณีกีฟีพีฅีฌ ีง ีฝีฟีพีฅึีกีตีซีถ ีทึีปีกีถีกีผีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ, ึ ีกีตีฝ ีฃีธึีฎีจีถีฉีกึีจ ีทีกึีธึีถีกีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีง ีฌีซีถีฅีฌีธึึ ีีถีกีตีกีฎ ีพีกึีธึีคีถีฅึีซ ีฏีธีฒีดีซึ ีขีกึีฑึีกึีพีกีฎ ีกีทีญีกีฟีกีถึีกีตีซีถ ีขีถีธึีตีฉีซ ีฐีกึึีฅึีจ ีบีกึีขีฅึีกีขีกึ ีฌีธึีฎีธึีด ีฅีถ ีฝีฟีกึีฅีฌ, ีซีถีนีบีฅีฝ ีถีกึ ีพีกึีธึีคีถีฅึีซีถ ีฐีกีตีฟีถีฅีฌ ีฅีถ, ีธึ ีฝีฟีพีฅึีกีตีซีถ ีทึีปีกีถีกีผีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฏึีณีกีฟีดีกีถีจ ีฆีธึีฃีจีถีฉีกึ ีขีกึีฅีฌีกีพีพีฅีฌีธึ ีฅีถ ีกีทีญีกีฟีกีถึีกีตีซีถ ีบีกีตีดีกีถีถีฅึีจ, ีกีตีถีธึีฐีกีถีคีฅึีฑ, ีซีถีนีบีฅีฝ ีพีฅึีจ ีถีทีพีฅึ, ีดีฅีฎ ีฉีพีธีพ ีพีกึีธึีคีถีฅึีซ ีฏีธีฒีดีซึ ีฐีฅึีฉีกีฏีกีถ ีกีถีฃีกีด ีกีผีกีป ีฅีถ ึีกีทีพีธึีด ีกีถีฟึีกีดีกีขีกีถีกีฏีกีถ ีบีกีฐีกีถีปีถีฅึ, ีธึีธีถึ ีฆีธึีฃีธึีคีพีธึีด ีฅีถ ีทีกีถีฟีกีชีซ ีคึีฝึีธึีธึีดีถีฅึีธีพยป,- ีีฅีตีฝีขีธึึีซ ีซึ ีงีปีธึีด ีฃึีฅีฌ ีง ิฟีธีฝีฟีกีถีตีกีถีจึ
